description: Poker Hands are sets of one to five cards that can be played in Balatro to obtain Chips and Mult for scoring.

regular_hands.description_en: When no other hand is possible, scores whichever played card is the highest rank.
regular_hands.description_zh: 當無法組成其他牌型時，以打出的最高點數牌計分。

regular_hands.description_en: Two cards with a matching rank. Suits may be different.
regular_hands.description_zh: 兩張相同點數的牌。花色可以不同。

regular_hands.description_en: Two cards with a matching rank and two cards with a different matching rank. Suits may differ.
regular_hands.description_zh: 兩張相同點數的牌，加上另外兩張不同但相同點數的牌。花色可以不同。

regular_hands.description_en: Three cards with a matching rank. Suits may be different.
regular_hands.description_zh: 三張相同點數的牌。花色可以不同。

regular_hands.description_en: Five cards with ranks that are in consecutive order. Suits may be different. Aces can be counted as high (A K Q J 10) or low (A 2 3 4 5), however, not at the same time.
regular_hands.description_zh: 五張連續點數的牌。花色可以不同。A 可作為最大（A K Q J 10）或最小（A 2 3 4 5），但不能同時。

regular_hands.description_en: Five cards of any rank that all share the same suit.
regular_hands.description_zh: 五張相同花色的牌，點數不限。

regular_hands.description_en: Three cards with a matching rank and two cards with a different matching rank, with cards from at least two or more suits.
regular_hands.description_zh: 三張相同點數的牌加上兩張另一相同點數的牌，需來自至少兩種花色。

regular_hands.description_en: Four cards with a matching rank. Suits may be different.
regular_hands.description_zh: 四張相同點數的牌。花色可以不同。

regular_hands.description_en: Five cards in consecutive order that all share the same suit.
regular_hands.description_zh: 五張連續點數且相同花色的牌。

regular_hands.description_en: A Straight Flush that contains an Ace, King, Queen, Jack, and 10 on the same suit. (Levels up alongside Straight Flush)
regular_hands.description_zh: 由 A、K、Q、J、10 組成的同花順。（與同花順共用等級）

secret_hands.description_en: Five cards with the same rank which are not all the same suit.
secret_hands.description_zh: 五張相同點數的牌，但不全是同一花色。

secret_hands.description_en: Three cards with the same rank, and two cards with the same rank, all from a single suit.
secret_hands.description_zh: 三張相同點數加兩張另一相同點數，全部同一花色。

secret_hands.description_en: Five cards with the same rank and same suit.
secret_hands.description_zh: 五張相同點數且相同花色的牌。

notes: All hands start at Level 1 at the beginning of a run
Hands are upgraded through Planet cards
Higher-tier hands take precedence over lower-tier hands
Only cards relevant to the hand are scored (except with Splash Joker)
Secret hands only appear in Run Info after being played once
